thread.title: IGC Engineering – A new era for gas storage
thread.title_full: IGC Engineering – A new era for gas storage

author: Rob Cockerill|published in gasworld magazine
title: IGC Engineering – A new era for gas storage
text:
IGC Engineering – A new era for gas storage 30 Sep 2015 | By Rob Cockerill , published in gasworld magazine 
IGC Engineering Limited, based in the North West of England, is a company experiencing new levels of growth as increasing numbers of businesses consider their options when it comes to their storage supply. IGC started as a small company with the vision to bring competition for the nationally based industrial gas providers. Get instant access to must-read content from top industry writers!
